/* USE : ProdOptionMapper.getProdList */
SELECT thp.HQ_OFFICE_CD, thp.PROD_CD, thp.PROD_NM, thp.PROD_CLASS_CD, ( SELECT SF_GET_PROD_CLASSES('H', thp.HQ_OFFICE_CD, thp.PROD_CLASS_CD) FROM DUAL ) AS PROD_CLASS_NM, thp.ORGPLCE_CD, -- TODO 원산지명 조회 필요 thp.PO_UNIT_FG
FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT thp WHERE thp.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd}
AND thp.PROD_CD = #{prodCd} --상품코드
AND thp.PROD_NM LIKE '%'||#{prodNm}||'%' --상품명
AND thp.USE_YN = 'Y' AND thp.SIDE_PROD_YN = 'N' AND thp.PROD_CD NOT IN ( SELECT OPT_PROD_CD FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT_OPTION_VAL WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND OPTION_GRP_CD = #{optionGrpCd} AND OPT_PROD_CD IS NOT NULL ) AND ( ( ((SELECT COUNT(HQ_BRAND_CD) FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}) != 0) AND (thp.HQ_BRAND_CD IN (SELECT HQ_BRAND_CD FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND WHERE USER_ID = #{userId})) ) OR ( ((SELECT COUNT(HQ_BRAND_CD) FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}) = 0) AND 1=1 ) )
AND thp.PROD_CLASS_CD IN ( SELECT PROD_CLASS_CD FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT_CLASS WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} START WITH PROD_CLASS_CD = #{prodClassCd} AND HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} CONNECT BY P_PROD_CLASS_CD = PRIOR PROD_CLASS_CD AND HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} )
AND thp.HQ_BRAND_CD = #{prodHqBrandCd} -- 선택한 상품브랜드가 있을 때
-- 선택한 상품브랜드가 없을 때('전체' 일때), 사용자 관리브랜드에 속한 정보만 조회 AND thp.HQ_BRAND_CD IN
#{item}
ORDER BY thp.PROD_CD
SELECT tmp.STORE_CD, tmp.PROD_CD, tmp.PROD_NM, tmp.PROD_CLASS_CD, ( SELECT SF_GET_PROD_CLASSES('S', tmp.STORE_CD, tmp.PROD_CLASS_CD) FROM DUAL ) AS PROD_CLASS_NM, tmp.ORGPLCE_CD, -- TODO 원산지명 조회 필요 tmp.PO_UNIT_FG, tmp.REG_DT
FROM TB_MS_PRODUCT tmp WHERE tmp.STORE_CD = #{storeCd}
AND tmp.PROD_CD = #{prodCd} --상품코드
AND tmp.PROD_NM LIKE '%'||#{prodNm}||'%' --상품명
AND tmp.REG_FG = 'H'
AND tmp.USE_YN = 'Y' AND tmp.SIDE_PROD_YN = 'N' AND tmp.PROD_CD NOT IN ( SELECT OPT_PROD_CD FROM TB_MS_PRODUCT_OPTION_VAL WHERE STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND OPTION_GRP_CD = #{optionGrpCd} AND OPT_PROD_CD IS NOT NULL ) AND ( ( ((SELECT COUNT(HQ_BRAND_CD) FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}) != 0) AND (tmp.HQ_BRAND_CD IN (SELECT HQ_BRAND_CD FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND WHERE USER_ID = #{userId})) ) OR ( ((SELECT COUNT(HQ_BRAND_CD) FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}) = 0) AND 1=1 ) )
AND tmp.PROD_CLASS_CD IN ( SELECT PROD_CLASS_CD FROM TB_MS_PRODUCT_CLASS WHERE STORE_CD = #{storeCd} START WITH PROD_CLASS_CD = #{prodClassCd} AND STORE_CD = #{storeCd} CONNECT BY P_PROD_CLASS_CD = PRIOR PROD_CLASS_CD AND STORE_CD = #{storeCd} )
ORDER BY tmp.PROD_CD
